skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my fridge
des:
Let's be less wasteful! Keep track of open things and food expiry dates inside your fridge. Sometimes we can't remember when things inside our fridge were opened or when they will expire, and this Alexa Skill can keep track of it for you.

Keep track of expiration dates!
Tell Alexa when something is going to expire, then ask if its already expired or when it's going to expire!
You can ask Alexa for a list of Item expiry dates, what Item(s) are about to expire or a list of all currently expired Items!
You can also ask Alexa to remove everything that has already expired!

Keep track of when something that was opened!
Tell Alexa that you opened something, then ask when you opened it! 
You can also get a list of things that have been opened, remove any opened Item and ask how many things are inside of your Fridge!

Here are a few handy phrases I like to use:

NEW!!

Say, "Alexa, tell My Fridge the milk expires on the 27th" to save an Item's expiry date!

Say , "Alexa, ask My Fridge what's about to expire" to get the Item(s) with the closest expiration date.

Say, "Alexa, ask My Fridge to remove my expired items" to remove everything that has already expired.

Say, "Alexa, ask My Fridge to give me a list of expiring items" to see everything that's set to expire.

Say, "Alexa, ask My Fridge what's expired" to get a list of all expired items.

NEW!!

"Alexa, tell My Fridge the eggs expire tomorrow"
"Alexa, ask My Fridge when the eggs expire"
"Alexa, tell My Fridge I just opened the milk." or "Alexa, tell My Fridge I opened the milk yesterday." 
"Alexa, ask my Fridge when was the milk opened" or "Alexa, ask My Fridge when did I open the milk"
"Alexa, ask My Fridge what's opened" Ask this and Alexa will give you a list of everything you told My Fridge was opened and for how long they have been opened for.
"Alexa, tell My Fridge to remove the milk"
"Alexa, ask My Fridge how many things are opened"

Many variations of each phrase will work. You can replace the word "milk" with any food item or drink in all of the following!
